BulkResponse.title: BulkResponse
BulkResponse.description:
Data info for bulk results

Attributes
----------

dataset:
    The dataset name
processed:
    Number of records in bulk
failed:
    Number of failed records

ClassPrediction.title: ClassPrediction
ClassPrediction.description:
Single class prediction

Attributes:
-----------

class_label: Union[str, int]
    the predicted class

score: float
    the predicted class score. For human-supervised annotations,
    this probability should be 1.0

CreationText2TextRecord.description:
Text2Text record

Attributes:
-----------

text:
    The input data text

CreationTextClassificationRecord.title: CreationTextClassificationRecord
CreationTextClassificationRecord.description:
Text classification record

Attributes:
-----------

inputs: Dict[str, Union[str, List[str]]]
    The input data text

multi_label: bool
    Enable text classification with multiple predicted/annotated labels.
    Default=False

explanation: Dict[str, List[TokenAttributions]]
    Token attribution list explaining predicted classes per token input.
    The dictionary key must be aligned with provided record text. Optional

CreationTokenClassificationRecord.title: CreationTokenClassificationRecord
CreationTokenClassificationRecord.description:
Dataset record for token classification task

Attributes:
-----------

tokens: List[str]
    The input tokens
text: str
    Textual representation of token list

total.title: Total
total.description: Total number of metrics available for datadaset

EntitySpan.title: EntitySpan
EntitySpan.description:
The tokens span for a labeled text.

Entity spans will be defined between from start to end - 1

Attributes:
-----------

start: int
    character start position
end: int
    character end position, must be higher than the starting character.
label: str
    the label related to tokens that conforms the entity span
score:
    A higher score means, the model/annotator is more confident about its predicted/annotated entity.

LabelingRule.title: LabelingRule

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: For multi label problems, a list of labels. It will replace the `label` field

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the rule

LabelingRule.description:
Adds read-only attributes to the labeling rule

Attributes:
-----------

author:
    Who created the rule

created_at:
    When was the rule created

LabelingRuleMetricsSummary.title: LabelingRuleMetricsSummary
LabelingRuleMetricsSummary.description: Metrics generated for a labeling rule

PredictionStatus.title: PredictionStatus
PredictionStatus.description:
The prediction status:

**OK**, for record containing a success prediction
**KO**, for record containing a wrong prediction

TaskStatus.title: TaskStatus
TaskStatus.description:
Task data status:

**Default**, default status, for no provided status records.
**Edited**, normally used when original annotation was modified but not yet validated (confirmed).
**Discarded**, for records that will be excluded for analysis.
**Validated**, when annotation was confirmed as ok.

    List of predicted agents

status: List[TaskStatus]
